text: Greeneville Municipal Airport is a public airport located two miles (3 km) north of the central business district of Greeneville, a town in Greene County, Tennessee, United States. It is owned by the Town of Greeneville. == Facilities and aircraft == Greeneville Municipal Airport covers an area of which contains one asphalt paved runway (5/23) measuring 6,302 x 100 ft (1,921 x 30 m). For the 12-month period ending March 30, 1998, the airport had 43,500 aircraft operations, an average of 119 per day: 69% general aviation, 30% air taxi and 1% military. == References == == External links == *Greeneville Municipal Airport page at Tennessee DOT Airport Directory * Category:Airports in Tennessee Category:Buildings and structures in Greene County, Tennessee Category:Transportation in Greene County, Tennessee
title: Greeneville–Greene County Municipal Airport
